Hello!

There're some little quirks in the new forum. I just made a list:

  • Where's the 'add reputation' button? Is this "Like" button?
  • There's a delay between searches. I think it's is inconvenient.
  • Why are there no results on the search term '64 bits'? Shouldn't there be loads of threads in the result?
  • There's no help page for forum functions.

 

Some taste-dependent stuff:

  • Why is the theme so... bright? I would really like to see more contrasting colors between posts, between post and signature, etc. I have problems discerning where the post contents starts and ends.
  • The quote button in a post should be beneath the like button.

 

Enough of nagging, here's some stuff I really like:

  • Notifications! They are incredible!
  • There's a notification if someone posted in a thread while you are still writing your response. Ninjas begone!
